issue.title: [Release][Docs] Normalize previous document version directory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17317](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17317). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should use X.Y instead of X.Y.Z (e.g.: 8.0 not 8.0.1) for previous version document directory.

See also: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/apache-arrow-9.0.0/dev/release/post-08-docs.sh#L84

The script should accept X.Y.Z such as 8.0.1 and normalize it to X.Y. It'll reduce human error.

See also:
- https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/228#issuecomment-1205997067
- https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/228#issuecomment-1206085602
